snippet: BNP’s guilty plea is the culmination of a long investigation into some of the world’s top banks. | Walgreen is looking to move abroad in a so-called inversion. | Who won the Bitcoin auction? | A group of New York hedge funds have backed Argentina...
abstract: BNP’s guilty plea is the culmination of a long investigation into some of the world’s top banks. | Walgreen is looking to move abroad in a so-called inversion. | Who won the Bitcoin auction? | A group of New York hedge funds have backed Argentina into a corner.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: The Road to BNP's Guilty Plea
